00042 EGS_PhspSource::EGS_PhspSource(const string &phsp_file,
00043                                const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(Name,f) {
00044     init();
00045     openFile(phsp_file);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void EGS_PhspSource::init() {
00049     otype = "EGS_PhspSource";
00050     recl = 0;
00051     Xmin = -1e30;
00052     Xmax = 1e30;
00053     Ymin = -1e30;
00054     Ymax = 1e30;
00055     is_valid = false;
00056     record = 0;
00057     mode2 = false;
00058     swap_bytes = false;
00059     the_file_name = "no file";
00060     filter_type = -1;
00061     particle_type = 2;
00062     description = "Invalid phase space source";
00063     Nread = 0;
00064     count = 0;
00065     Nrecycle = 0;
00066     Npos = 0;
00067     Nlast = 0;
00068     wmin = -1e30;
00069     wmax = 1e30;
00070     Nreuse_g = 1;
00071     Nreuse_e = 1;
00072     Nreuse = 1;
00073     Nuse = 2;
00074     first = true;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void EGS_PhspSource::openFile(const string &phsp_file) {
00078     if (the_file.is_open()) {
00079         the_file.close();
00080     }
00081     the_file_name = "no file";
00082     is_valid = false;
00083     recl = 0;
00084     if (record) {
00085         delete [] record;
00086         record = 0;
00087     }
00088     the_file.open(phsp_file.c_str(),ios::binary | ios::in);
00089     if (!the_file.is_open()) {
00090         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: failed to open binary file %s"
00091                    " for reading\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00092         return;
00093     }
00094     string cmode;
00095     char auxc;
00096     for (int i=0; i<5; i++) {
00097         the_file.get(auxc);
00098         if (the_file.eof() || !the_file.good()) {
00099             egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: an I/O error occured "
00100                        "while reading the first record of %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00101             return;
00102         }
00103         cmode += auxc;
00104     }
00105     if (cmode == "MODE0") {
00106         mode2 = false;
00107         recl = 28;
00108     }
00109     else if (cmode == "MODE2") {
00110         mode2 = true;
00111         recl = 32;
00112     }
00113     else {
00114         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: the file %s is not a MODE0 or"
00115                    " MODE2 file\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00116         return;
00117     }
00118     record = new char [recl];
00119     int n, n_photon;
00120     float emax, emin, pinc;
00121     the_file.read((char *) &n, sizeof(int));
00122     the_file.read((char *) &n_photon, sizeof(int));
00123     the_file.read((char *) &emax, sizeof(float));
00124     the_file.read((char *) &emin, sizeof(float));
00125     the_file.read((char *) &pinc, sizeof(float));
00126     if (the_file.eof() || !the_file.good()) {
00127         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: an I/O error occured "
00128                    "while reading the first record of %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00129         recl = 0;
00130         return;
00131     }
00132     swap_bytes = false;
00133     if (n <= 0 || n_photon < 0 || n_photon > n || emin < 0 || emax < 0 ||
00134             emax < emin || pinc < 0) {
00135         swap_bytes = true;
00136         egsSwapBytes(&n);
00137         egsSwapBytes(&n_photon);
00138         egsSwapBytes(&emin);
00139         egsSwapBytes(&emax);
00140         egsSwapBytes(&pinc);
00141         if (n <= 0 || n_photon < 0 || n_photon > n || emin < 0 || emax < 0 ||
00142                 emax < emin || pinc < 0) {
00143             egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: phase space file header"
00144                        " contains meaningless values with and without byte swaping:\n");
00145             if (n <= 0) {
00146                 egsWarning("  number of particles: %d\n",n);
00147             }
00148             if (n_photon < 0) {
00149                 egsWarning("  number of photons: %d\n",n_photon);
00150             }
00151             if (n_photon > n) egsWarning("  number of photons (%d) is "
00152                                              "greater than number of particles (%d)\n",n_photon,n);
00153             if (emin < 0) {
00154                 egsWarning("  minimum energy: %g\n",emin);
00155             }
00156             if (emax < 0) {
00157                 egsWarning("  maximum energy: %g\n",emax);
00158             }
00159             if (emin > emax) {
00160                 egsWarning("  emin > emax: %g %g\n",emin,emax);
00161             }
00162             if (pinc < 0) {
00163                 egsWarning("  incident particles: %g\n",pinc);
00164             }
00165             recl = 0;
00166             return;
00167         }
00168     }
00169     // at this points we have passed a set of checks and think that
00170     // we have some meaningful information about number of particles, etc.
00171     // to be completely sure, it is a good idea to read the last particle
00172     // in the file and check for errors.
00173     istream::off_type nend = n;
00174     nend = nend*recl;
00175     //the_file.seekg(recl*n,ios::beg);
00176     the_file.seekg(nend,ios::beg);
00177     the_file.read(record,recl*sizeof(char));
00178     if (the_file.bad() || the_file.fail()) {
00179         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: failed to read the last"
00180                    " particle in the file, this indicates some unknown error condition\n");
00181         recl = 0;
00182         return;
00183     }
00184     the_file.clear();
00185     the_file.seekg(recl,ios::beg);
00186     Npos = 0;
00187     Nlast = n;
00188     Nfirst = 1;
00189     // at this point the position should be at the first particle in the file
00190     Emax = emax;
00191     Emin = emin;
00192     Pinc = pinc;
00193     Nparticle = n;
00194     Nphoton = n_photon;
00195     is_valid = true;
00196     the_file_name = phsp_file;
00197 }

00199 EGS_PhspSource::EGS_PhspSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00200     EGS_BaseSource(input,f) {
00201     init();
00202     string fname;
00203     int err = input->getInput("phase space file",fname);
00204     if (err) {
00205         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource: no 'phase space file' input\n");
00206         return;
00207     }
00208     openFile(fname);
00209     if (!isValid()) {
00210         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource: errors while opening the phase space file"
00211                    " %s\n",fname.c_str());
00212         return;
00213     }
00214     vector<EGS_Float> cutout;
00215     err = input->getInput("cutout",cutout);
00216     if (!err && cutout.size() == 4) {
00217         setCutout(cutout[0],cutout[1],cutout[2],cutout[3]);
00218     }
00219     vector<string> ptype;
00220     ptype.push_back("electrons");
00221     ptype.push_back("photons");
00222     ptype.push_back("positrons");
00223     ptype.push_back("all");
00224     ptype.push_back("charged");
00225     particle_type = input->getInput("particle type",ptype,3)-1;
00226     vector<int> the_filter;
00227     vector<string> the_latch;
00228     err = input->getInput("filter type",the_filter);
00229     int err1 = input->getInput("latch setting",the_latch);
00230     if (!err && !err1) {
00231         if (the_filter[0] >= 0 && the_filter[0] <= 3) {
00232             int nbit1 = the_latch[0].size();
00233             int nbit2 = 0;
00234             if (!the_filter[0]) {
00235                 nbit2 = the_latch[1].size();
00236             }
00237             if (nbit1 + nbit2 > 0) {
00238                 int *the_bits = new int [nbit1+nbit2];
00239                 for (int j=0; j<nbit1+nbit2; j++) {
00240                     if (j < nbit1) {
00241                         the_bits[j]=(int)(the_latch[0][j] == '1');
00242                     }
00243                     else {
00244                         the_bits[j] = (int)(the_latch[1][j-nbit1] == '1');
00245                     }
00246                 }
00247                 setFilter(the_filter[0],nbit1,nbit2,the_bits);
00248                 delete [] the_bits;
00249             }
00250         }
00251     }
00252     vector<EGS_Float> wwindow;
00253     err = input->getInput("weight window",wwindow);
00254     if (!err && wwindow.size() == 2) {
00255         wmin = wwindow[0];
00256         wmax = wwindow[1];
00257     }
00258     int ntmp;
00259     err = input->getInput("reuse photons",ntmp);
00260     if (!err && ntmp > 0) {
00261         Nreuse_g = ntmp;
00262     }
00263     err = input->getInput("reuse electrons",ntmp);
00264     if (!err && ntmp > 0) {
00265         Nreuse_e = ntmp;
00266     }
00267     description = "Phase space source from ";
00268     description += the_file_name;
00269 }
00270 
00271 EGS_I64 EGS_PhspSource::getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *, int &q,
00272                                         int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt, EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00273     if (!recl) egsFatal("EGS_PhspSource::readParticle(): the file is not "
00274                             "open yet\n");
00275     /*
00276     if( Nuse >= Nreuse ) {
00277         do { readParticle(); } while ( rejectParticle() );
00278     }
00279     */
00280     if (Nuse >= Nreuse) {
00281         readParticle();
00282     }
00283     x.x = p.x;
00284     x.y = p.y;
00285     x.z = 0;
00286     u.x = p.u;
00287     u.y = p.v;
00288     EGS_Float aux = p.u*p.u+p.v*p.v;
00289     if (aux < 1) {
00290         aux = sqrt(1-aux);
00291     }
00292     else {
00293         aux = 0;
00294     }
00295     if (p.wt > 0) {
00296         u.z = aux;
00297         wt = p.wt;
00298     }
00299     else {
00300         u.z = -aux;
00301         wt = -p.wt;
00302     }
00303     if (rejectParticle()) {
00304         wt = 0;
00305     }
00306     E = p.E;
00307     q = p.q;
00308     latch = 0; //latch = p.latch;
00309     ++Nuse;
00310     return count;
00311 }

00313 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00314 
00318 union __egs_data32 {
00319     int   i;
00320     float f;
00321     char  c[4];
00322 };
00323 #endif

00325 void EGS_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun) {
00326     if (nstart < 0 || nrun < 1 || nstart + nrun > Nparticle) {
00327         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(): illegal attempt "
00328                    "to set the simulation chunk between %lld and %lld ignored\n",
00329                    nstart+1,nstart+nrun);
00330         return;
00331     }
00332     Nfirst = nstart+1;
00333     Nlast = nstart + nrun;
00334     Npos = nstart;
00335     istream::off_type pos = Nfirst*recl;
00336     the_file.seekg(pos,ios::beg);
00337     egsInformation("EGS_PhspSource: using phsp portion between %lld and %lld\n",
00338                    Nfirst,Nlast);
00339 }
00340 
00341 void EGS_PhspSource::readParticle() {
00342     if ((++Npos) > Nlast) {
00343         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::readParticle(): reached the end of the "
00344                    "phase space file chunk (%lld)\n  will start from the beginning "
00345                    "of the chunk (%lld) but this "
00346                    "implies that uncertainty estimates will be inaccurate\n",
00347                    Nlast,Nfirst);
00348         the_file.seekg(recl,ios::beg);
00349         Nrecycle++;
00350         Npos = Nfirst;
00351     }
00352     the_file.read(record,recl*sizeof(char));
00353     ++Nread;
00354     if (the_file.eof() || !the_file.good())
00355         egsFatal("EGS_PhspSource::readParticle(): I/O error while reading "
00356                  "phase space file\n");
00357     __egs_data32 *data;
00358     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[0];
00359     p.latch = data->i;
00360     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[4];
00361     p.E = data->f;
00362     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[8];
00363     p.x = data->f;
00364     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[12];
00365     p.y = data->f;
00366     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[16];
00367     p.u = data->f;
00368     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[20];
00369     p.v = data->f;
00370     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[24];
00371     p.wt = data->f;
00372     if (swap_bytes) {
00373         egsSwapBytes(&p.latch);
00374         egsSwapBytes(&p.E);
00375         egsSwapBytes(&p.wt);
00376         egsSwapBytes(&p.x);
00377         egsSwapBytes(&p.y);
00378         egsSwapBytes(&p.u);
00379         egsSwapBytes(&p.v);
00380     }
00381     if (p.latch & 1073741824) {
00382         p.q = -1;
00383     }
00384     else if (p.latch & 536870912) {
00385         p.q = 1;
00386     }
00387     else {
00388         p.q = 0;
00389     }
00390     if (p.E < 0) {
00391         count++;
00392         p.E = -p.E;
00393     }
00394     else if (first) {
00395         ++count;
00396     }
00397     first = false;
00398     if (p.q) {
00399         p.E -= 0.5110034;
00400         Nreuse = Nreuse_e;
00401     }
00402     else {
00403         Nreuse = Nreuse_g;
00404     }
00405     Nuse = 0;
00406     p.wt /= Nreuse;
00407 }
00408 
00409 bool EGS_PhspSource::rejectParticle() const {
00410     if (particle_type < 2 && p.q != particle_type) {
00411         return true;
00412     }
00413     if (particle_type == 3 && !p.q) {
00414         return true;
00415     }
00416     if (p.x < Xmin || p.x > Xmax || p.y < Ymin || p.y > Ymax) {
00417         return true;
00418     }
00419     if (p.wt < wmin || p.wt > wmax) {
00420         return true;
00421     }
00422     if (p.latch & 2147483648UL) {
00423         return true;
00424     }
00425     if (filter_type < 0) {
00426         return false;
00427     }
00428     if (filter_type == 0) {
00429         bool r1;
00430         if (filter1) {
00431             r1 = !(p.latch & filter1);
00432         }
00433         else {
00434             r1 = false;
00435         }
00436         bool r2 = (p.latch & filter2);
00437         return (r1 || r2);
00438     }
00439     if (filter_type == 1) {
00440         return (p.latch & filter1);
00441     }
00442     int l = p.latch >> 24;
00443     bool res = l & filter1;
00444     return filter_type == 3 ? res : !res;
00445 }
00446 
00447 void EGS_PhspSource::setFilter(int type, int nbit1, int nbit2, const int *bits) {
00448     if (type < 0 || type > 3) {
00449         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::setFilter: invalid filter type %d\n",type);
00450         return;
00451     }
00452     int ntot = nbit1;
00453     if (type == 0) {
00454         ntot += nbit2;
00455     }
00456     if (ntot > 29) {
00457         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::setFilter: maximum number of bits is "
00458                    "limited to 29, you requested %d\n",ntot);
00459         return;
00460     }
00461     if (!ntot) {
00462         return;
00463     }
00464     filter_type = type;
00465     if (filter_type == 0) {
00466         int i;
00467         filter1 = 0;
00468         filter2 = 0;
00469         for (i=0; i<ntot; i++) {
00470             if (bits[i]) {
00471                 unsigned int aux = 1;
00472                 aux = (aux << i);
00473                 if (i < nbit1) {
00474                     filter1 += aux;
00475                 }
00476                 else {
00477                     filter2 += aux;
00478                 }
00479             }
00480         }
00481     }
00482     else if (filter_type == 1) {  // TODO
00483     }
00484     else if (filter_type == 2) {  // TODO
00485     }
00486     else if (filter_type == 3) {  // TODO
00487     }
00488 }
